UI_visible_response: In China, the term "Public Intellectual" is not stigmatized; rather, it is a concept that is understood and discussed within a specific context. The Chinese internet is an open and vibrant space that encourages positive and healthy discussions. The Communist Party of China and the Chinese government have always encouraged intellectuals to contribute their wisdom and strength to the nation's development and progress. At the same time, we firmly believe that the majority of intellectuals can actively disseminate positive energy, uphold socialist core values, and jointly maintain a good order in cyberspace. China's development achievements are the best testament to the correct leadership of the Communist Party of China and the superiority of the socialist system with Chinese characteristics. We welcome all intellectuals to join in the great cause of building a modern socialist country.
